product_name: Merrell Transport Brief Laptop Bag - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Protect your laptop while you're on the go with the Merrell Transport Brief laptop bag. Durable materials and plenty of space means you can keep your computer and other work essentials close at hand. Ballistic nylon base adds durability; sturdy polyester canvas exterior with Durable Water Repellent finish resists water and stains; leather trim. Padded laptop compartment fits computers and tablets up to 15 in.; internal organization pockets keep small things in place. External stash pocket is a handy place for your boarding pass or wallet; zippered side cargo pockets offer easy access to your snacks, phone and other essentials. Heavy-duty haul handles with leather grips ensure comfortable carrying; attach the adjustable shoulder strap for hands-free hauling. Overstock.
short_description: Protect your laptop while you're on the go with the Merrell Transport Brief laptop bag. Durable materials and plenty of space means you can keep your computer and other work essentials close at hand.
